>Note remember to update the libtalloc proot ndk and packages and atleast make it updated


#GENERATE libterminal.so

$open termux
cd $HOME
wget https://github.com/MrIkso/AndroidIDE-NDK/releases/download/ndk/android-ndk-r27b-aarch64.zip
unzip android-ndk-r27b-aarch64.zip
$copy the terminal folder to $HOME
cd terminal
export NDK_PROJECT_PATH=$PWD
~/android-ndk-r27b/ndk-build

$The output libs will be in terminal/libs folder

#GENERATE libk* files

$open termux
$copy the build-kbm.sh to $HOME
bash build-kbm.sh

$The output libs will be in output folder (it will be in linux abi add it to respectetive android ani)

#GENERATE package.tar.gz files

$open termux
$copy the packages.sh to $HOME
bash packages.sh <rootfs folder of the pkg> <config of the pkg "config.json" file>

$The output will be in backup folder
